Requests.GetAllSubcategories: SELECT SubcategoryId, CategoryId, SubcategoryName FROM Subcategories
Requests.GetAllProducts: SELECT ProductId, SubcategoryId, ProductName, ProductDescription, ProductImageUrl FROM Products
Requests.GetAllImages: SELECT ImageId, ProductId, ImageUrl FROM Images
Requests.GetAllDrawings: SELECT DrawingId, ProductId, DrawingName, DrawingDescription, DrawingImageUrl FROM Drawings
